name: 陳文輝
objective: This course aims to teach students how to develop applications using object-oriented programming languages.
schedule:
Java Collection
Graphs and Applications
Multithreading and Parallel Programming
Networking
Database Programming

Midterm exam 30%
Term project 30%
materials:

Introduction to Java Programming, Comprehensive Version 9/E, Y. Daniel Liang
